content.text:
# 12th Golden Horse Awards

The 12th Golden Horse Awards (Mandarin:第12屆金馬獎) took place on  October 30, 1975, at Zhongshan Hall in Taipei, Taiwan.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first, highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable
|-
| valign="top" width="50%"|
* Land of the Undaunted
**Long Way from Home (runner-up)
**Miss Staff Sergeant (runner-up)
**The Empress Dowager (runner-up)
**The Life God (runner-up)
**Girl Friend (runner-up)
| valign="top" width="50%"|
* Feng Huo Ci Hang
**Mu Qin Xin Sheng (runner-up)
**Zengwen Dam (runner-up)
**Greenland (runner-up)
**Coal Mining in Ruifang (runner-up)
|-
